# dotfiles

1. Log in as root
2. Run the command:
```bash
bash <(curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/toh995/dotfiles/main/.bin/setup)
```
3. When the script is complete, you should be prompted to reboot.

### After Reboot
#### Firefox setup
1. Open up firefox, then close it
2. Run the script `arkenfox_update`
